article_title: 5 Things You Need To Know About The 'Stewarts & Hamiltons' Cast Member
article_text:
The Eye

Sean Stewart: 5 Things You Need To Know About The 'Stewarts & Hamiltons' Cast Member

SIGN UP TO RECEIVE THE LATEST NEWS FROM FASHION&STYLE

(Photo : Instagram/Sean Stewart)

Intrigued by the "Stewarts & Hamiltons" cast? We know the feeling. Each week we'll be dishing on a new cast member — read on for five fast facts about Alana and Rod Stewart's son Sean Stewart:



RELATED: 5 Things You Need To Know About 'Stewarts & Hamiltons' Star Kimberly Stewart



1. He has a bit of a bad boy reputation, thanks to a three-month stay in prison after a bar fight in 2002 and his appearance on Season 2 of "Celebrity Rehab With Dr. Drew" in 2008, alongside Gary Busey and Amber Smith.



2. He also starred alongside Aaron Spelling's son Randy and David Weintraub in the A&E series "Sons of Hollywood" (for which he wrote the theme song) in 2007.



RELATED: 5 Things You Need To Know About 'Stewarts & Hamiltons' Star George Hamilton Jr.



3. He has a handful of tattoos, including a sleeve on one arm, several large pieces on the other arm, three on his stomach, one on his chest and a giant tribal piece on his back.



4. He recently started a clothing line called Sean's Dirty Weekend, described by The Mirror as "affordable" and "not high end, not flash."



RELATED: 5 Things You Need To Know About 'Stewarts & Hamiltons' Star Ashley Hamilton



5. In recent years he's been making an effort to clean up his act, spending his mornings at the gym and eating healthier.



"I'm in such a new chapter in my life where my health and wellness is my main concern," he told Daily Mail. "I'm feeling good, I'm feeling healthy."



Catch up on the latest Sean Stewart news HERE and tune into new episodes of "Stewarts & Hamiltons" Sunday nights at 9 p.m. on E!.
